name: Woodways
description:
Woodways is a puzzle game in which you control all characters at once. Guide different animals to their destination, each with its own attributes and ways to interact with the environment. Travel through various areas with new mechanics and visuals, filled with all sorts of combinations of layouts and characters.Key features:
  • Discover over 50 levels of puzzles ranging from simple to complex in an expanding world map.
  • Control 3 types of animals, each with its own properties and interactions.
  • New mechanics are introduced at each new area, such as slippery ice and teleport pads.
  • Is there another game in which you can play as a buffalo, a fox AND a duck at the same time? Yeah, didn't think so.
